name: jscs
description: Extension to lint JavaScript files using jscs.
author: Microsoft Corporation

jscs.enable.description: Control whether JSCS is enabled for JavaScript files or not.

jscs.preset.description: The JSCS preset to use. Possible values: "airbnb", "crockford", "google", "grunt", "idiomatic", "jquery", "mdcs", "node-style-guide", "wikimedia", "wordpress", "yandex"

jscs.disableIfNoConfig.description: Disable JSCS if no configuration file found.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd ../jscs-server && npm run compile && cd ../jscs && node ./node_modules/vscode/bin/compile
